content.content: Trustlessness in Blockchain: Problem:  Everyone uses OnlyOwner as their only form of Access control Users do not know what trust system the application they are using employ  Approach:  Defining Trust - Setting precise attributes & terms (U2U & U2O & O2O) Communication about the Trust Dynamic rules of trust breakdown Security & consequences Implementation (Cross system Trust management) Trusting the bridges & Oracles that connect the platforms Address Disaster Recovery  Solution:  Access Control = Big Problem Weights on functions that makes & breaks the contract Etherscan integration  Trust parameters(ongoing exploration):  Upgrades to the contract Access Control (Admin) Special Privilege  More on this can be found in the presentation: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GdgLoVQRkjti26LlK0rBc87cyUkLS0tVXUQvECgFUfY/edit#slide=id.g3ff9c637c2_0_76
